Its name is a portmanteau of Halca ( Ã£Æ’ï¿½Ã£Æ’Â«Ã£â€šÂ« Haruka?) and Yucali ( Ã£Æ’Â¦Ã£â€šÂ«Ã£Æ’Âª Yukari?). Their debut album, Halcali Bacon, reached #5 on the Oricon charts, making it the first album by a female hip-hop artist to enter the top ten in Japanese history.
